subject: Re: [junit] Job opportunities in Herndon, VA
msgSnippet: ... I realize that this a purely useless reply, but I can t resist. If only it were in Toronto.... I d enjoy pairing with you, Bob, even if just in an
messageBody:
>So said Bob Koss on 2003-06-05 --------------------
>
>Symantec Corp, in Herndon, VA, is looking for two senior Java developers.
>Must have XP experience and must be a senior java developer (I state the
>latter because you just wouldn't believe the twits that we've seen applying
>for the job). If you're invited for an interview, you'll be expected to
>pair
>program as part of the interview - quite possibly with me.
>
>If I haven't scared you away yet, send me your resume. I'll see that it
>gets
>to the guys that matter.
>
>My relationship to Symantec is that I'm their XP Coach.

I realize that this a purely useless reply, but I can't resist. If only it were in Toronto.... I'd enjoy pairing with you, Bob, even if just in an interview.

Good luck finding not-a-twit.

Take care.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/
telephone: +1 416 791-8603
